Longitudinal average of temperature perturbation \(T - (4\pi r^{2})^{-1} \int T dS\) (left) and zonal velocity field \(u_\phi\) (right) in the fluid shell at \(t = 6.320 \times 10^{2} \tau_{\nu}\).
